name: Cup of Jasmine Tea
description:
It's a game I've done for the Weekly Hour Game Jam W8 2017.
The theme was Jasmine tea... ;-)

All right I made in more than 1 hour. But it is mostly because it's hard to find good sprites for this.

It's a point and click game. It's a puzzle. You have to find a way to make some tea. Here's the controls :
left click to hold an object
right click to release an object

There are some prompt to guide you through this path ;-)

Enjoy it.

Credits :
kitchen background : http://opengameart.org/users/jcrown41
water bottle : http://opengameart.org/users/clint-bellanger
